issue.title: [CF 1383] Ability to track absorb and incoming heals?
issue.body:
Hey

 

I recently started moving most of my UI to TMW to reduce the load on my system (since TMW is the last addon I'll be willing to give up anyway).

 

Two things I am missing are:

  1. Ability to track incoming heals/ HoTs
  2. Ability to track Absorb shield

Since both of these are quite important as a tank I am loosing a lot of valuable visual data....


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1383 | Raw

comments.body:
You can get both of these numbers via DogTag. [IncomingHeal] and [TotalAbsorb].

Edited Feb 21, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

My intention was whether or not it was possible to show absorb as its own bar, rather than a number/%

Edited Mar 5, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg

No, you can't.
